name: They Are Hundreds
description: They Are hundreds is a sandbox first-person survival. Build great walls, fight great hordes of varying types, or just have a goof with friends in multiplayer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3-2100 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: r7 260x, GTX 750Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1+ Processor: i5-3470 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Rx 560 4gb, GTX 770 2gb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
